navbarColor: md:my-10 md:w-max md:m-auto md:rounded-lg md:blcok flex flex-col bg-gradient-to-r justify-end from-[#EF629F] to-[#f0d88a] shadow-inner drop-shadow-2xl

buttons.css: text-white md:border-r-2 border-b-2 md:border-b-0 hover:opacity-80 text-3xl py-8 px-20

parentButton.css: md:border-2 border-white py-5 pl-28 md:pl-0 md:pl-0  text-lg md:bg-[#F38D98] bg-transparent md:border-b-0 border-b-2  rounded-lg md:shadow-inner drop-shadow-2xl transition ease-in-out   hover:-translate-y-1 hover:scale-110 hover:bg-[#e0747f] duration-300
